metadata.title: CVE-2019-14271 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Docker 19.03.x before 19.03.1 linked against the GNU C Library (akaglibc), code injection can occur when the nsswitch facility dynamicallyloads a library inside a chroot that contains the contents of thecontainer.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
